stories.title: Trump weighs order requiring banks to collect citizenship dataPublished46 minutes agoThe administration is exploring using the financial system as an immigration enforcement tool, the Wall Street Journal reported.125 sources
Fed officials warn AI could reshape jobs, rates37 sources
US and NATO launch major Arctic exercises amid rising tensions51 sources
Russia opens criminal case against Telegram's Durov61 sources

Supreme Court shields USPS from suits over withheld mailPublished2 hours agoA 5-4 ruling found federal law protects the Postal Service from lawsuits even when employees deliberately refuse to deliver mail.31 sources

Trump to pitch economic wins in State of the Union addressPublished3 hours agoThe president plans to tout affordability measures and defend his agenda amid falling poll numbers and a Supreme Court tariff rebuke.57 sources
Oklahoma lawmakers weigh data center moratorium as water demands soar60 sources
Savannah Guthrie offers $1M reward for missing mother40 sources
New US tariffs take effect at 10%, below rate Trump promised57 sources

US details alleged secret Chinese nuclear test, urges disarmament talksPublished5 hours agoWashington presented declassified seismic evidence of a 2020 underground test at China's Lop Nur site. Beijing called the accusation "completely unfounded."41 sources

Cook, Huang, Su got secret CIA briefing on China-Taiwan threatPublished5 hours agoA New York Times investigation reveals that top tech CEOs received classified intelligence warnings about a potential Chinese move on Taiwan by 2027.61 sources
Trump taps Pentagon AI to set prices for critical minerals40 sources
Russia losing troops faster than it can replace them, Western officials say41 sources
House to vote on aircraft locator bill after Pentagon pulls support39 sources

Meta signs 6-gigawatt AI chip deal with AMDPublished7 hours agoAMD issued Meta a warrant for up to 160 million shares, with vesting tied to shipment milestones across a multi-year GPU deployment.45 sources

Russia warns US nuclear testing would trigger 'domino effect'Published7 hours agoMoscow responded to Washington's escalating accusations against China and signals it may resume nuclear testing for the first time since 1992.44 sources
NPR finds DOJ deleted Epstein files tied to Trump53 sources
Iran nears deal to buy supersonic missiles from China41 sources
Oil tanker costs hit 6-year high as US-Iran war fears mount64 sources

NASA delays Artemis II rollback to Wednesday due to weatherPublished9 hours agoA helium flow problem discovered Feb. 21 has already eliminated the March launch window, pushing the crewed Moon mission to April at the earliest.35 sources

Software stocks rally as Anthropic unveils enterprise partnershipsPublished1 hour agoAnthropic introduced ten new plug-ins for its Claude AI platform with major partners, easing weeks of fear that AI would replace existing software businesses.80 sources
Trump to unveil tech industry energy pledges at State of the Union78 sources
Court filings reveal Facebook's unreleased teen app Bell90 sources
Jupiter's moons may have formed with life's building blocks, studies find50 sources

Microsoft teams with Starlink to bring internet to underserved communitiesPublished2 hours agoThe partnership, unveiled at MWC 2026, aims to build "AI-ready communities" in rural and hard-to-reach regions worldwide.79 sources

DeepSeek's V4 AI model appears imminent, raising fears of another Nasdaq selloffPublished2 hours agoCNBC reports the anticipated release of DeepSeek's coding-focused model could rattle tech stocks, echoing the $593 billion Nvidia rout a year ago.87 sources
Meta plans stablecoin payments relaunch with Stripe as likely partner47 sources
Chinese AI models capture 61% of token use on OpenRouter63 sources
Flock surveillance cameras destroyed in at least 5 states amid ICE backlash62 sources

OpenAI tells investors its agents will replace Salesforce, Adobe, WorkdayPublished4 hours agoThe claim, made during a pitch for a funding round that could top $100 billion, has deepened a sell-off erasing over $1 trillion from software stocks.84 sources

DJI sues FCC over drone ban, alleging no evidence of security threatPublished4 hours agoThe Chinese drone giant filed a petition with the Ninth Circuit challenging the agency's decision to block new DJI models from the U.S. market.64 sources
Anthropic proposes theory for why AI chatbots act human-like48 sources
Study finds ChatGPT Health missed over half of emergencies in triage test51 sources
Anthropic launches new Claude Cowork plugins for HR, banking, and design87 sources

Musk accuses Anthropic of 'stealing training data' after its claims against Chinese AI labsPublished5 hours agoThe attack came after Anthropic alleged three Chinese firms ran "industrial-scale" distillation campaigns using 16 million Claude queries.41 sources

Microsoft launches sovereign cloud for fully offline AI and productivityPublished5 hours agoThe expansion lets governments and regulated industries run large AI models, Office apps, and Azure infrastructure with no internet connection.30 sources
Waymo launches robotaxis in 4 new cities, doubling to 10 US markets63 sources
MIT report exposes hidden human labor behind humanoid robots96 sources
CrowdStrike reports 89% surge in AI-powered cyberattacks49 sources

Anthropic CEO compares AI's rapid advance to a tsunami society is ignoringPublished8 hours agoDario Amodei warned of enormous economic and geopolitical risks from AI in a candid podcast recorded in Bangalore with Zerodha co-founder Nikhil Kamath.47 sources

U.S. sets steep anti-subsidy duties on solar imports from 3 nationsPublished16 minutes agoThe Commerce Department imposed preliminary countervailing duties of up to 126% on solar cells and panels from India, Indonesia, and Laos.78 sources
Tech stocks stage modest rebound after AI-fueled selloff87 sources
Arnault family crosses 50% ownership of LVMH for the first time47 sources
Weinstein warns 'wheels coming off' private credit63 sources

U.S. home prices post weakest annual gain in 14 yearsPublished58 minutes agoThe Case-Shiller index showed national home values rose just 1.3% in 2025, the slowest pace since 2011, as inflation eroded real returns.66 sources

US development finance agency pivots toward sovereign wealth fund modelPublished1 hour agoA staff memo reveals the DFC plans to prioritize financial returns alongside its development mission, fulfilling a key Trump objective.73 sources
California seeks injunction to halt Amazon's alleged price-fixing49 sources
Economists rank deficit reduction as top US priority after tariff ruling64 sources
All but richest 5% pay higher taxes in 2026, ITEP finds116 sources

Citrini report co-author calls for AI tax after selloff shook global marketsPublished3 hours agoAlap Shah says governments should tax AI windfall gains to cushion mass white-collar layoffs he warns could cut 5% of jobs within 18 months.38 sources

Trump's new tariff regime exempts aerospace industryPublished3 hours agoThe Section 122 surcharge replacing Supreme Court-struck IEEPA tariffs took effect Tuesday, with commercial aircraft, engines, and parts excluded.53 sources
Spirit Airlines reaches deal to exit bankruptcy as smaller carrier88 sources
Wall Street rebounds as AMD-Meta chip deal lifts sentiment after Monday's rout88 sources
Viral AI doomsday report helps fuel Dow's worst day in a month56 sources

Family offices fuel luxury hotel buying wave in NYC, LondonPublished3 hours agoPrivate investors and family offices are snapping up iconic hotels, with over $1 billion in deals closing in New York and London in recent months.85 sources

FDIC: US banks posted record $295.6B in profits in 2025Published4 hours agoFalling deposit costs, wider lending margins and accelerating loan growth drove a 10% increase over the prior year, surpassing the 2021 record.72 sources
US consumer confidence edges up, topping forecasts after January's 12-year low63 sources
US investors bought $15B in Chinese stocks in 202587 sources
Blue Owl Capital faces lawsuits, downgrades after halting fund redemptions71 sources

Fed's Cook warns AI could cause joblessness beyond monetary policy's reachPublished5 hours agoThe governor said conventional rate tools may fail to fix AI-driven unemployment without also fueling inflation, urging non-monetary policy responses.113 sources
